thread.title: Royals' Cain out with right knee soreness
thread.title_full: Royals' Cain out with right knee soreness

title: Royals' Cain out with right knee soreness
text:
Royals' Lorenzo Cain sidelined by right knee soreness; Alex Rios out with sore back THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   6:29   6:30   
People: 
Illinois (1014) 

CHICAGO â€” Kansas City center fielder Lorenzo Cain has a sore right knee and is out of the lineup for the Royals' series finale against the Chicago White Sox . 
The AL Central champions also were without Alex Rios on Thursday night after he was scratched because of a stiff back. Paulo Orlando got the start in center field, and Jonny Gomes was in right. 
Manager Ned Yost says Cain and Rios are day to day. 
Cain fouled a pitch off his knee in the seventh inning Wednesday night in a 5-3 victory over the White Sox. The All-Star is batting .303 with a career-high 16 homers and 71 RBIs in 139 games.
